# CODEOWNERS --- Generated by principled-github
#
# This file defines code ownership for pull request reviews.
# It is organized by module boundaries following the principled
# documentation structure.
#
# Format: <pattern> <owner1> [<owner2> ...]
# Owners can be GitHub usernames (@user) or team names (@org/team).
#
# Lines marked with "# manual" are preserved across regeneration.
# All other lines may be overwritten by /gen-codeowners.

# Global ownership (fallback)

# Documentation
